lead_paragraph: Ramadan may be the holiest time of year in the Muslim faith, one in which the days are spent fasting and in prayer. But as Jennifer Colin discovered after arriving in Cairo during the middle of Ramadan, this solemn city comes unexpectedly to life once darkness falls.
snippet: During Ramadan, Cairo days are quiet as residents fast from dawn to dusk. But at night, it lights up.
abstract: During Ramadan, Cairo days are quiet as residents fast from dawn to dusk. But at night, it lights up.
